DataElement.preferredName: Child Physical Therapy Currently Receiving Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: person's response indicating whether or not their child is currently receiving physical therapy.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who is not yet an adult. The specific cut-off age will vary by purpose._The treatment of deformity or disease through mechanical force and movement, including both active and passive exercises, intended to ameliorate injury, increase mobility, and improve overall function._An indication that an individual is receiving something at the present time.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A son or daughter of any age, including biological offspring and sometimes including unborn children, adopted children, stepchildren, foster children and children born outside of marriage; person under an age specified by law.

Concepts.definition: An age group comprised of individuals who are not yet an adult. The specific cut-off age will vary by purpose.

Property.preferredDefinition: The treatment of deformity or disease through mechanical force and movement, including both active and passive exercises, intended to ameliorate injury, increase mobility, and improve overall function.:An indication that an individual is receiving something at the present time.

Concepts.definition: The treatment of deformity or disease through mechanical force and movement, including both active and passive exercises, intended to ameliorate injury, increase mobility, and improve overall function.
An indication that an individual is receiving something at the present time.
